name: Mint (itch) (leokrechmer, MauiGameStudio, ppreda)
description:
MINT Controls:

F11 - Force Fullscreen

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move

LEFT CLICK - Progress Dialogs | Jump off walls

There are two movement modes in this game. The walking movement utilizes arrow keys. The other form of movement requires a left-click. A mouse click is also used to continue during dialogue.

Story:

Follow Mint as she wakes from a cryogenic slumber pod. Her machine seems to have awakened her earlier than predicted. Follow her journey as she learns why she was prematurely awoken from her sleep.

Team:

Preda - Lead Developer

Joseph Abraham - Animation and Environment Art - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1197520/Familia/

Leo Krechmer - Music and Sound Effects

Jeremiah Black - Portrait Art
